title: Tiki Cooler
directions: Place a few ice cubes in a pitcher; add pineapple juice, coconut milk, lime juice, and almond-flavored syrup and stir until chilled. Strain mixture and pour into 4 glasses.
Top each glass with club soda; mocktail will foam up.
Dust each mocktail with nutmeg. Garnish with a lime wheel, sprig of mint, and umbrella.
ingredients: 1 cup club soda, or as needed
